getProviderForMethod
description: Check the availability of a method.

params.name: numberOfBlocks
params.description: Number of blocks to be generated

return.description:
Returns a promise with Block hash of the
 generated blocks if resolved. Throws an Error if rejected.

name: getBlockByHash
description: Get a block given its hash.

params.name: blockHash
params.description:
A hexadecimal string that represents the *hash* of the
 desired block.

params.name: includeTx
params.description: If true, fetches transaction in the block.

return.description:
Returns a Block with the same hash as
 the given input. Throws an Error if no block was found. If `includeTx` is true, the
 transaction property is an array of Transactions; otherwise, it is a list of
 transaction hashes.

name: getBlockByNumber
description: Get a block given its number.

params.name: blockNumber
params.description: The number of the desired block.

params.name: includeTx
params.description: If true, fetches transaction in the block.

return.description:
Returns a Block with the same number as
 the given input. Throws an Error if no block was found. If `includeTx` is true, the
 transaction property is an array of Transactions; otherwise, it is a list of
 transaction hashes.

name: getBlockHeight
description: Get the current block height of the chain.

name: getTransactionByHash
description: Get a transaction given its hash.

params.name: txHash
params.description:
A hexadecimal string that represents the *hash* of the
 desired transaction.

return.description:
Returns a Transaction with the
 same hash as the given input. Throws an Error if no transaction was found.

name: getRawTransactionByHash
description: Get a raw hexadecimal transaction given its hash.

params.name: txHash
params.description:
A hexadecimal string that represents the *hash* of the
 desired transaction.

return.description:
Returns the raw Transaction with the same hash as the
 given output. Throws an Error if no transaction was found.

content:
# Chain Abstraction Layer
[![JavaScript Style Guide](https://cdn.rawgit.com/standard/standard/master/badge.svg)](https://github.com/standard/standard)

Query different blockchains with a single and simple interface.


## Usage

```javascript
import ChainAbstractionLayer from 'chainabstractionlayer'

const { BitcoinRPCProvider } = ChainAbstractionLayer.providers.bitcoin

const bitcoin = new ChainAbstractionLayer(new BitcoinRPCProvider('http://localhost:8080', 'bitcoin', 'local321'))

bitcoin
  .generateBlock(1) // returns Promise
  .then(console.log) // Array<BlockHash>
```


## Development

### 1. Clone the project and link it locally

```bash
git clone git@github.com:ConsenSys/chainabstractionlayer.git
cd chainabstractionlayer
npm link
```

### 2. Use it in other projects

```bash
cd mycrosschain
npm link chainabstractionlayer
```

## Build documentation

```bash
npm run build:docs
```

## Publish documentation

```bash
npm run publish:docs
```
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "chainabstractionlayer",
  "private": "true",
  "keywords": [
    "blockchain",
    "bitcoin",
    "ethereum",
    "client"
  ],
  "main": "dist/index.cjs.js",
  "browser": "dist/index.umd.js",
  "files": [
    "dist/index.cjs.js",
    "dist/index.umd.js"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "cover": "nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text npm test",
    "lint": "standard \"**/*.js\" \"**/*.html\" \"**/*.md\"",
    "test": "cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha $npm_package_options_mocha",
    "build:dev:node": "webpack --config webpack.node.config.js",
    "build:dev:browser": "webpack --config webpack.browser.config.js",
    "build:node": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production npm run build:dev:node",
    "build:browser": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production npm run build:dev:browser",
    "build:docs": "esdoc",
    "build:dev": "run-p build:dev:*",
    "build": "run-p build:browser build:node",
    "publish:docs": "npm run build && npm run build:docs && gh-pages -d docs/ -m \"Auto-generated commit for documentation\""
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@ledgerhq/hw-app-btc": "^4.20.0",
    "@ledgerhq/hw-app-eth": "^4.19.0",
    "@ledgerhq/hw-transport-node-hid": "^4.19.1",
    "@ledgerhq/hw-transport-u2f": "^4.20.0",
    "ajv": "^6.5.2",
    "axios": "^0.18.0",
    "base-x": "^3.0.4",
    "bcrypto": "^1.0.0",
    "bech32": "^1.1.3",
    "bs58": "^4.0.1",
    "crypto-js": "^3.1.9-1",
    "json-bigint": "^0.3.0",
    "lodash": "^4.0.0",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.12.0",
    "standard-error": "^1.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0-beta.54",
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.0.0-beta.54",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.0.0-beta.54",
    "@babel/register": "^7.0.0-beta.54",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.0-beta.4",
    "babel-plugin-istanbul": "^4.1.6",
    "babel-plugin-lodash": "^3.3.4",
    "browserify": "^16.2.2",
    "chai-as-promised": "^7.1.1",
    "cross-env": "^5.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-html": "^4.0.5",
    "eslint-plugin-markdown": "^1.0.0-beta.6",
    "gh-pages": "^1.2.0",
    "lodash-webpack-plugin": "^0.11.5",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "nock": "^9.3.0",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.3",
    "nyc": "^12.0.2",
    "pre-commit": "^1.2.2",
    "should": "^13.2.1",
    "standard": "^11.0.1",
    "webpack": "^4.16.1",
    "webpack-bundle-analyzer": "^2.13.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=8"
  },
  "nyc": {
    "include": [
      "src/"
    ],
    "instrument": false,
    "report-dir": "./coverage",
    "sourceMap": false
  },
  "options": {
    "mocha": "--require @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill --timeout 20000 --recursive --require should"
  },
  "pre-commit": [
    "lint",
    "build",
    "test"
  ],
  "standard": {
    "plugins": [
      "html",
      "markdown"
    ],
    "ignore": [
      "dist/**",
      "docs/**"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
